thread.title: Brilliant location
thread.title_full: Brilliant location - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: loujane1960
title: Brilliant location
text: Stayed here in March for the England rugby match at Twickenham and chose this hotel because of its location, Easy access to train for us to get to the rugby game. Also an ideal spot to visit Westminster with the Eye and other attractions within easy walking distance or a few minutes by tube. Excellent breakfast with enough choice for the pickiest of people. Reception staff were lovely and when we had a problem with the iMac it was resolved very quickly. Lovely room with nice comfy bed. Only downside was not enough milk in my room for night time coffees, I was too lazy to walk to reception to ask for more. But we would highly recommend this hotel and we chose it because it was part of the Hilton chain. Definitely would visit again
